name: kvParse
description: Parses key-value pairs in various formats including quoted and unquoted values. Extracts keys as field names with their corresponding values.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The field containing key-value pairs to parse. Defaults to @rawstring if not specified

use_cases: Parsing log messages with key-value format
Extracting structured data from unstructured text
notes:
Supports multiple formats:
- key=value
- key="value"
- key='value'
- key = value (with spaces)
Both key and value can be quoted or unquoted.
